title: Roman Borisov
text:
Roman Viktorovich Borisov (; born 4 August 1981) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Avangard%20Kursk">FC Avangard Kursk</a> in 2005.
